column1: #Text=Richard231- Canada, on the other hand, selects refugees, after weeks of interviews and examinations, based on whether or not they can be an economic asset to Canada.
#Text=The vast majority of Syrians refugees are of no economic benefit to Canada.
#Text=They were brought in because of campaign one-upmanship from Trudeau.
#Text=There were numerous stories in this paper and others of the Canadian government trawling through refugee camps because most didn't want to come here.
